pr_title: HBASE-24698 Turn OFF Canary WebUI as default

timeline.bodyText: Why removing the static final declaration and use the string literal directly?
timeline.author: Apache9

replies.bodyText: Both defines are used in one place only. These defines seem superfluous when one-use only.  What you thinking?
replies.author: saintstack

replies.bodyText:
The DEFAULT_CANARY_INFOPORT is not used anywhere anymore after this change.
Let me put back HBASE_CANARY_INFO_BINDADDRESS so you'll +1 on this and I can get it in. Thanks.
replies.author: saintstack

replies.bodyText: I think it's fine to remove these constants, at least to make them private. Anyway, I see no reason for them to be public.
replies.author: ndimiduk

timeline.message: HBASE-24698 Turn OFF Canary WebUI as default
